titleStmt.title: A testimony to the power of God being greater than the power of Satan contrary to all those who hold no perfection here, no freedom from sin on this side of the grave / which doleful doctrine is here testified against by Richard Baker.
titleStmt.author: Baker, Richard, d. 1697.
Baker, Mary.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by T. Sowle,

notesStmt.note: Mary Baker's testimony concerning her husband: p. [5]
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
